name: sfpwowerscripts-createsourcepackage-task
friendlyName: Creates a new  version of  Source Based Package
description: Creates a new  version of  Source Based Package ,This task is part of DX@Scale/SFPowerscripts
helpMarkDown: This task simulates a packaging experience similar to unlocking packaging, just by writing the commit id to an artifact. It is basically to help with the release pipelines
author: dxatscale@accenture.com
instanceNameFormat: Creates a new version of Source Based Package for  $(package)

inputs.name: version_number
inputs.label: the version number of the package to be crated
inputs.helpMarkDown: The format is major.minor.patch.buildnumber . This will override the build number mentioned in the sfdx-project.json, Try considering the use of Increment Version Number task before this task

inputs.name: isDiffCheck
inputs.label: Only run task if package has changed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this box to enable package creation only when the package has been modified

inputs.name: isGitTag
inputs.label: Tag latest commit ID with package name and version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags the latest commit with the package name and version, upon successful build

inputs.name: project_directory
inputs.label: Project Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: versionControlProvider
inputs.label: Select the version control provider
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a version control provider from the dropdown

inputs.name: github_connection
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your GitHub connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read to the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: bitbucket_connection
inputs.label: BitBucket Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your BitBucket connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read to the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: github_enterprise_connection
inputs.label: GitHub Enterprise Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the service connection name for your Git Hub Enterprise connection. Please note this service connection have permissions to read from the correspinding repostiory. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username for the Version Control Provider

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: App Password/PAT for the Version Control Provider

OutputVariables.name: sfpowerscripts_package_version_number
OutputVariables.description: The version number of the package that was created
